entry.title: Open Studio
entry.content: Open studio hours with Michael McDermott in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.
entry.summary: Open studio hours with Michael McDermott in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.

entry.title: Grand Opening
entry.content: Friday Studio’s official first day. Come for for the free coffee and stay to work among your friends and other students. Michael McDermott will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help.
entry.summary: Friday Studio’s official first day. Come for for the free coffee and stay to work among your friends and other students. Michael McDermott will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help.
